summary:
I just re-remembered that Cyberpunk 2077 is a thing that is in the making and got suddenly very excited all over again.
Gonna...
body:
I just re-remembered that Cyberpunk 2077 is a thing that is in the making and got suddenly very excited all over again.

Gonna probably be another year before release, but no matter what I’m getting my hands on it!

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 transcurre en la misma línea temporal que el juego de mesa
title: Cyberpunk 2077 transcurre en la misma línea temporal que el juego de mesa
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 transcurre en la misma línea temporal que el juego de mesa

Cyberpunk 2077, el próximo y esperadísimo trabajo de CD Projekt RED, es una adaptación del juego de mesa Cyberpunk 2020. Dicho juego de tablero fue creado por Mike Pondsmith y llegó al mercado en 1988.

Tratándose de un universo tan tecnológico como el que se describe en ambas obras, es lógico que existan cambios a nivel de los aparatos e inventos utilizados. Pero existía la duda de si ambos…

View On WordPress

tags: after the betrayal of Bioware Bethesda and even Blizzard i'm really starving for some good rpg
CDPR and Larian are literally the last devs who still have my trust
i'll be happy if CP2077 will be on the same level as TW3 'cause that game blew my mind
so far the game looks AWESOME
the more i listen to Mike Pondsmith talk about his baby the more i love it
summary: I’m literally the same with the whole “watch the gameplay trailer for Cyberpunk 2077 every night and cry myself to sleep” I’m so...
question: I’m literally the same with the whole “watch the gameplay trailer for Cyberpunk 2077 every night and cry myself to sleep” I’m so anxious for this game to come out because I’m praying it’s the rpg that the gaming industry needs. *exhales anxiety
answer:
yeah, a few months back i didn’t even care about Cyberpunk, i was like ‘oh, CDPR are making a sci-fi thingie. whatever. not my thing’. then i watched the trailer and the demo and realised that it’s definitely my thing. i would pre-order a pre-order if i could!

anyhow, i have faith in my fellow polish neighbours, ‘cause i hear they’re getting their budget from the government itself and there’s literally no one above them yelling at them to ship an unfinished game out, so i don’t think we’re gonna have another Mass Effect Andromeda. but for now… we wait for that E3. anxiously.

reblog.comment:

anyhow, i have faith in my fellow polish neighbours, ‘cause i hear they’re getting their budget from the government itself and there’s literally no one above them yelling at them to ship an unfinished game out, so i don’t think we’re gonna have another Mass Effect Andromeda. but for now… we wait for that E3. anxiously.

anyhow, i have faith in my fellow polish neighbours, ‘cause i hear they’re getting their budget from the government itself and there’s literally no one above them yelling at them to ship an unfinished game out, so i don’t think we’re gonna have another Mass Effect Andromeda. but for now… we wait for that E3. anxiously.

anyhow, i have faith in my fellow polish neighbours, ‘cause i hear they’re getting their budget from the government itself and there’s literally no one above them yelling at them to ship an unfinished game out, so i don’t think we’re gonna have another Mass Effect Andromeda. but for now… we wait for that E3. anxiously.

summary: i think i've watched the cyberpunk gameplay a hundred times. when will we get new info? i'm literally dying for more
question: i think i've watched the cyberpunk gameplay a hundred times. when will we get new info? i'm literally dying for more
answer: saaame. i made it my tradition to rewatch the demo every other day (and i still notice new things!). them polish bastards promised to ‘blow our minds’ this E3, so i’m feeling pretty positive. if CP2077′s release date gonna be around Christmas i’m gonna cry tears of pure and blissful joy.

reblog.comment: saaame. i made it my tradition to rewatch the demo every other day (and i still notice new things!). them polish bastards promised to ‘blow our minds’ this E3, so i’m feeling pretty positive. if CP2077′s release date gonna be around Christmas i’m gonna cry tears of pure and blissful joy.

summary: I’m really hoping that we get a release window FFVII remake and Cyberpunk 2077 sometime this year (ideally this summer). Like I...
body: I’m really hoping that we get a release window FFVII remake and Cyberpunk 2077 sometime this year (ideally this summer). Like I don’t care if both are another 2-3 years away. Just having an idea of when I might see them would be great.

reblog.comment: I’m really hoping that we get a release window FFVII remake and Cyberpunk 2077 sometime this year (ideally this summer). Like I don’t care if both are another 2-3 years away. Just having an idea of when I might see them would be great.
